info.name: recolor.me see it like niteowl xiii ssc wanted it
info.description:
this is it, this is how recolor.me was supposed to be. i decided after my brother killed himself to finally make this script and to fix it up so that i could show everyone what niteowl really wanted. ive used his acct a couple of times to test things but this is for him even if he cant use it 
im hoping someone else will find it useful too
info.additionalInfo:
PLEASE... i beg anyone who uses this to give it a chance before you delete, uninstall or alter this in any way. its also a very personal script and its protected do not attempt to claim any part of this at all. if you have suggestions please send them to our shared email at juangarcia9930@gmail.com
if i feel that your sugestion will make this better i will edit this script and give credit to whatever your user name is on recolor.me and say that you helped my family with this UPDATED script on here 

i always give credit where credit is due so let me know in the email what your recolor name is
